Wanted by the mafia, a new York City bike messenger escapes into the world of parkour after meeting a beautiful stranger.

Director: Daniel Benmayor
Writers: Leslie Bohem, Matt Johnson
Stars: Taylor Lautner, Marie Avgeropoulos, Rafi Gavron
Genres: Action
Country: USA
Language: English


Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time


Source: HK-INC
thx

Notes:
firstly this is not a new source, took the source file and played with it

Encode:
source was something between 4:3 and not widescreen,if you want the 4:3 ar aquos release is just fine btw
tried to get it to full widescreen without loosing much video, in the end its all about choices
I changed ar, changed aspect, cropped a bit on top and bit on bottom and ended in full widescreen.
added brightness,fixed contrast and rgb, slightly sharpen

it does look just fine now, its not the sharpest, but it will do till retail for me

enjoy

Video: 712x380 @bitrate 1800 2pass
Audio: English AC3 2.0 Stereo
Sample: yes included
